title: Asset Allocation: The Foundation of Portfolio Strategy
excerpt: Understand how to allocate your investments across different asset classes based on your goals and risk tolerance.
editorial_summary: This article explains asset allocation fundamentals, including how to determine the right mix of stocks, bonds, and other assets based on age, risk tolerance, and time horizon. It covers age-based allocation rules (like the 100-minus-age rule), rebalancing strategies, and how asset allocation affects portfolio returns and volatility. Includes allocation models for different investor profiles.
